description: In this role I drive the frontend architecture of Aspera products, with a specific focus on design standards, scalability, reliability, performance and NPS growth. I work closely with design to ensure consistency and patterns that meet our customer needs. I started as a Lead engineer before being promoted to Architect in July 2019.
Frontend software engineer for customer facing offerings working closely with the design team. Mostly working with Angular, HTML, JS, Sketch.

Frontend software engineer working on enterprise level web applications. I work closely with the design team on ensuring proper UX and UI patterns and also conducted user research studies with existing customers for UX. I was the lead frontend developer for our fist SaaS offering of Aspera Files.

I was responsible for the universityâ€™s public facing websites and developed a new website that modernized the school's web presence. As a graphic designer, I was responsible for creating graphics, document layouts and icons. This also included creating print material, billboards and custom logo items.

As the web designer and IT manager I was responsible for maintaining our web server (on-prem and later cloud), website, email server, and network setup. This job also included maintaining all equipment. While working here I developed several applications to improve operations.
